block-definition.comment: Reports a sorted version of the list in its first input slot, using the comparison function in the second input slot. For a list of numbers, using < as the comparison function will sort from low to high; using > will sort from high to low.

block-definition.comment: This block reports "true" if there is a variable with this given name (input slot) in that context. It can be a global, sprite or script variable. Otherwise it reports "false".
block-definition.translations: pt:a variável _ existe ca:existeix la variable _ ? es:existe la variable _ ? de:existiert var _ ?

block-definition.comment: This block sets the given value (last input) to the variable named with the name givent (var input). It looks for that variable following the scope order 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global' (the first match it finds). If that variable does not exist (in any scope) an error happens, stopping their script. You can check it before using the "does var (name) exists?" block.
block-definition.translations: ca:assigna a _ el valor _ es:asignar a _ el valor _ pt:altera _ para _ de:setze var _ auf _

block-definition.comment: This block creates new variables on the selected scope: global (for all sprites), sprite (for this sprite only) or script (only for that blocks stack) with the names given (in 'names' list). If there is already a variable with that name in that scope, it does nothing: no errors and no overwrites.
block-definition.translations: pt:cria as variáveis _ _ ca:crea les _ variables _ es:crear las _ variables _ de:erstellen _ var _

block-definition.comment: This block reports the value of the variable with the name given. It looks for that variable following the scope order 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global' (the first match it finds). If that variable does not exist (in any scope) an error happens, stopping their script. You can check it before using the "does var (name) exists?" block.
block-definition.translations: pt:o valor de _

block.l: function parametricSplineInterpolation(points, numPoints = 100) { if (points.length < 2) { throw new Error("Should have at least two pooints"); } const t = points.map((_, i) => i); const x = points.map(p => p.asArray()[0]); const y = points.map(p => p.asArray()[1]); // 计算三次样条插值的系数 function calculateCoefficients(t, values) { const n = t.length; const h = []; const alpha = []; const l = []; const mu = []; const z = []; const a = values.slice(); const b = new Array(n).fill(0); const c = new Array(n).fill(0); const d = new Array(n).fill(0); // 计算 h 和 alpha for (let i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) { h[i] = t[i + 1] - t[i]; alpha[i] = (3 / h[i]) * (a[i + 1] - a[i]) - (3 / (h[i - 1] || 1)) * (a[i] - a[i - 1] || 0); } // 计算 l, mu, z l[0] = 1; mu[0] = 0; z[0] = 0; for (let i = 1; i < n - 1; i++) { l[i] = 2 * (t[i + 1] - t[i - 1]) - h[i - 1] * mu[i - 1]; mu[i] = h[i] / l[i]; z[i] = (alpha[i] - h[i - 1] * z[i - 1]) / l[i]; } l[n - 1] = 1; z[n - 1] = 0; c[n - 1] = 0; // 计算 c, b, d for (let j = n - 2; j >= 0; j--) { c[j] = z[j] - mu[j] * c[j + 1]; b[j] = (a[j + 1] - a[j]) / h[j] - h[j] * (c[j + 1] + 2 * c[j]) / 3; d[j] = (c[j + 1] - c[j]) / (3 * h[j]); } return { a, b, c, d }; } // 计算 x 和 y 的插值系数 const xCoeff = calculateCoefficients(t, x); const yCoeff = calculateCoefficients(t, y); // 生成插值点 const result = []; const totalSegments = t.length - 1; const step = totalSegments / numPoints; for (let i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) { const ti = i * step; // 找到 ti 所在的区间 let segmentIndex = 0; for (let j = 0; j < t.length - 1; j++) { if (ti >= t[j] && ti <= t[j + 1]) { segmentIndex = j; break; } } // 计算 x 和 y 的插值值 const dt = ti - t[segmentIndex]; const xi = xCoeff.a[segmentIndex] * 1 + xCoeff.b[segmentIndex] * dt + xCoeff.c[segmentIndex] * dt * dt + xCoeff.d[segmentIndex] * dt * dt * dt; const yi = yCoeff.a[segmentIndex] * 1 + yCoeff.b[segmentIndex] * dt + yCoeff.c[segmentIndex] * dt * dt + yCoeff.d[segmentIndex] * dt * dt * dt; result.push(new List([xi, yi])); } return result; } let controlPoints = points.asArray(); let curvePoints = parametricSplineInterpolation(controlPoints,nb); return new List(curvePoints);

block.l: if (this.tracked) { this.tracks = new List(); return; } else { this.tracked = true; this.tracks = new List(); } if (!this.trackingOpened) { this.backupSetPosition = this.setPosition; this.trackingOpened = true; this.down = function() { var len; this.isDown = true; if (this.tracked) { len = this.tracks.length(); if (this.tracks.at(len) == '!') { this.tracks.add(new List([this.xPosition(),this.yPosition()])); } } } this.setPosition = function (aPoint, justMe) { var len,lastX,lastY; if (this.tracked) { len = this.tracks.length(); if (len == 0 && this.isDown) { this.tracks.add(new List([this.xPosition(),this.yPosition()])); } if (len == 0 && !this.isDown) { this.tracks.add('!'); } } this.backupSetPosition(aPoint, justMe); if (this.tracked) { len = this.tracks.length(); if (this.isDown) { if (this.tracks.at(len) == '!'){ this.tracks.add(new List([this.xPosition(),this.yPosition()])); }else{ lastX = this.tracks.at(len).at(1); lastY = this.tracks.at(len).at(2); if (lastX != this.xPosition() || lastY != this.yPosition()) { this.tracks.add(new List([this.xPosition(),this.yPosition()])); } } }else{ if (len != 0 && this.tracks.at(len) != '!') { lastX = this.tracks.at(len).at(1); lastY = this.tracks.at(len).at(2); if (lastX != this.xPosition() || lastY != this.yPosition()) { this.tracks.add('!'); } } } } } }

block.l: function findSmallestClosedRegion(paths, point) { // caculate to collect all the line segments const { segments, vertices } = splitPathsAtIntersections(paths); // build the graph const graph = buildGraph(segments, vertices); // find all the closed cycles let allCycles = findUniqueCycles(graph).map(cycle => cycle.map(point => point.split(',').map(Number))); // find all the cycles containing the specified point allCycles = allCycles.filter(cycle => filterDouble(cycle).length > 1); const containingCycles = allCycles.filter(cycle => { return isPointInPolygon(point, [...cycle,cycle[0]]); }); // find the cycle with the smallest area if (containingCycles.length === 0) return []; let minArea = Infinity; let smallestCycle = null; for (const cycle of containingCycles) { //const polygon = cycleToPolygon(cycle, segments); const polygon = cycle; const area = calculatePolygonArea(polygon); if (area < minArea) { minArea = area; smallestCycle = cycle; } }; const containedCyclesAll = allCycles.filter(cycle => { return isCycleInCycle(cycle,smallestCycle); }); const containedCycles = containedCyclesAll.filter(cycle => { return !isCycleInCycles(cycle,containedCyclesAll); }); return [smallestCycle].concat(containedCycles); } function splitPathsAtIntersections(paths) { const segments = []; const vertices = new Map(); const intersections = new Map(); const allOriginalSegments = []; for (const path of paths) { for (let i = 1; i < path.length; i++) { allOriginalSegments.push([[parseFloat(path[i-1][0]),parseFloat(path[i-1][1])], [parseFloat(path[i][0]),parseFloat(path[i][1])]]); } } for (let i = 0; i < allOriginalSegments.length; i++) { const seg1 = allOriginalSegments[i]; for (let j = i+1; j < allOriginalSegments.length; j++) { const seg2 = allOriginalSegments[j]; const intersection = getIntersection(seg1, seg2); if (intersection && !(isEndpoint(intersection, seg1) && isEndpoint(intersection, seg2))) { if (!intersections.has(i)) intersections.set(i, []); if (!intersections.has(j)) intersections.set(j, []); intersections.get(i).push(intersection); intersections.get(j).push(intersection); } } } for (let i = 0; i < allOriginalSegments.length; i++) { const seg = allOriginalSegments[i]; const intPoints = intersections.get(i) || []; intPoints.push(seg[0]); intPoints.push(seg[1]); intPoints.sort((a, b) => a[0] === b[0] ? a[1] - b[1] : a[0] - b[0]); for (let j = 1; j < intPoints.length; j++) { if (!pointsEqual(intPoints[j-1], intPoints[j])) { const newSeg = [intPoints[j-1], intPoints[j]]; const segIndex = segments.length; segments.push(newSeg); for (const pt of newSeg) { const key = pt.join(','); if (!vertices.has(key)) vertices.set(key, []); vertices.get(key).push(segIndex); } } } } return { segments, vertices }; } function buildGraph(segments, vertices) { const graph = new Map(); // create adjacent table for each vertice for (const [pt, segIndices] of vertices.entries()) { const ptCoords = pt.split(',').map(Number); const neighbors = new Set(); for (const segIndex of segIndices) { const seg = segments[segIndex]; const otherPt = pointsEqual(seg[0], ptCoords) ? seg[1] : seg[0]; const otherKey = otherPt.join(','); neighbors.add(otherKey); } graph.set(pt, Array.from(neighbors)); } console.log('graph:'); console.log(graph); return graph; } function normalizeCycle(cycle) { let minIndex = 0; for (let i = 1; i < cycle.length; i++) { const currentStr = cycle[i].toString(); const minStr = cycle[minIndex].toString(); if (currentStr < minStr) minIndex = i; } const rearranged = cycle.slice(minIndex, -1).concat(cycle.slice(0, minIndex)); const reversed = [...rearranged].reverse(); const rearrangedStr = rearranged.toString(); const reversedStr = reversed.toString(); return rearrangedStr < reversedStr ? rearranged : reversed; } function findAllCycles(graph) { const cycles = []; const visited = new Set(); let deadNodes = new Set(); function dfs(node, path, startNode) { visited.add(node); path.push(node); const neighbors = graph.get(node) || []; if (deadNodes.has(node)){ for (const neighbor of neighbors || []) { if ((graph.get(neighbor) || []).length < 3) { deadNodes.add(neighbor); } } }; for (const neighbor of neighbors) { if (neighbor === startNode && path.length >= 3) { cycles.push([...path, startNode]); } if (!visited.has(neighbor)) { dfs(neighbor, path, startNode); } } path.pop(); visited.delete(node); } for (const node of graph.keys()) { deadNodes.add(node); dfs(node, [], node); visited.clear(); for (const deadNode of deadNodes){ graph.delete(deadNode); } deadNodes.clear(); } return cycles; } function findUniqueCycles(graph) { const allCycles = findAllCycles(graph); const cycleMap = new Map(); for (const cycle of allCycles) { const normalized = normalizeCycle(cycle); const key = normalized.toString(); const reversedKey = normalized[0].concat(',',normalized.slice(1).reverse().toString()); if (!cycleMap.has(key) && !cycleMap.has(reversedKey)) { cycleMap.set(key, normalized); } } return Array.from(cycleMap.values()); } function isPointInPolygon(point, polygon, tolerance=1e-10) { const [x, y] = point; let inside = false; if (polygon.length > 0 && (polygon[0][0] !== polygon[polygon.length-1][0] || polygon[0][1] !== polygon[polygon.length-1][1])) { polygon = [...polygon, polygon[0]]; } for (let i = 0, j = polygon.length - 1; i < polygon.length; j = i++) { const [xi, yi] = polygon[i]; const [xj, yj] = polygon[j]; if (isPointOnSegment([x, y], [xi, yi], [xj, yj], tolerance)) { return false; } const intersect = ((yi > y) !== (yj > y)) && (x <= (xj - xi) * (y - yi) / (yj - yi) + xi); if (intersect) inside = !inside; } return inside; } function isPointOnSegment(point, segmentStart, segmentEnd, tolerance=1e-10) { const [x, y] = point; const [x1, y1] = segmentStart; const [x2, y2] = segmentEnd; //check if the point is in the circle if (x < Math.min(x1, x2) || x > Math.max(x1, x2) || y < Math.min(y1, y2) || y > Math.max(y1, y2)) { return false; } // check if the point is on the border return Math.abs((x - x1) * (y2 - y) - (y - y1) * (x2 - x)) < tolerance; } function isPointInPolygons(point,polygons,tolerance=1e-10) { for (const polygon of polygons) { if (isPointInPolygon(point,polygon,tolerance)) { return true; } } return false; } function isCycleInCycle(cycle1,cycle2) { const key1 = cycle1.toString(); const key2 = cycle2.toString(); const cycle = [...cycle2,cycle2[0]]; if (key1 == key2) { return false; } let count = 0; for (i=0;i<cycle1.length;i++) { if (!isPointInPolygon(cycle1[i],cycle)) { count++; } } if (count < 2) { return true; } else { return false; } } function isCycleInCycles(cycle,cycles) { for (let i = 0; i< cycles.length; i++) { if (isCycleInCycle(cycle,cycles[i])) { return true; } } return false; } function calculatePolygonArea(polygon) { let area = 0; const n = polygon.length; for (let i = 0; i < n; i++) { const [x1, y1] = polygon[i]; const [x2, y2] = polygon[(i + 1) % n]; area += x1 * y2 - x2 * y1; } return Math.abs(area) / 2; } function findPolygonTrajectoryIntersections(polygon, trajectory) { const intersections = []; if (polygon.length > 0 && (polygon[0][0] !== polygon[polygon.length-1][0] || polygon[0][1] !== polygon[polygon.length-1][1])) { polygon = [...polygon, polygon[0]]; } for (let i = 0; i < trajectory.length - 1; i++) { const t1 = trajectory[i]; const t2 = trajectory[i+1]; for (let j = 0; j < polygon.length - 1; j++) { const p1 = polygon[j]; const p2 = polygon[j+1]; const intersection = getIntersection( [t1, t2], [p1, p2] ); if (intersection) { intersections.push(intersection); } } } return intersections; } function getIntersection(seg1, seg2) { const [p1, p2] = seg1; const [p3, p4] = seg2; const x1 = p1[0], y1 = p1[1]; const x2 = p2[0], y2 = p2[1]; const x3 = p3[0], y3 = p3[1]; const x4 = p4[0], y4 = p4[1]; const denom = (y4 - y3) * (x2 - x1) - (x4 - x3) * (y2 - y1); if (denom === 0) return null; // 平行或共线 const ua = ((x4 - x3) * (y1 - y3) - (y4 - y3) * (x1 - x3)) / denom; const ub = ((x2 - x1) * (y1 - y3) - (y2 - y1) * (x1 - x3)) / denom; if (ua >= 0 && ua <= 1 && ub >= 0 && ub <= 1) { return [ roundToN(x1 + ua * (x2 - x1),10), roundToN(y1 + ua * (y2 - y1),10) ]; } return null; } function isEndpoint(point, segment) { return pointsEqual(point, segment[0]) || pointsEqual(point, segment[1]); } function pointsEqual(p1, p2) { return Math.abs(p1[0] - p2[0]) < 1e-11 && Math.abs(p1[1] - p2[1]) < 1e-11; } function roundToN(num, n) { const factor = Math.pow(10, n); return Math.round(num * factor) / factor; } function isShapeClosed(line) { const start = line[0]; const end = line[line.length-1]; return roundToN(start[0],8) === roundToN(end[0],8) && roundToN(start[1],8) === roundToN(end[1],8); } function distanceOf(pt1,pt2) { return Math.sqrt((pt2[0]-pt1[0])**2 + (pt2[1]-pt1[1])**2); } function filterDouble(path) { if (path.length === 0) { return []; } let result = [path[0]]; for(let i=1;i<path.length;i++){ if ( distanceOf(result[result.length-1],path[i]) > 0.1 ) { result.push(path[i]); } } return result; } function splitPathsAtIntersectionsForMergedPolygons(paths) { const segments = []; const vertices = new Map(); const intersections = new Map(); const allOriginalSegments = []; for (const path of paths) { for (let i = 1; i < path.length; i++) { allOriginalSegments.push([[parseFloat(path[i-1][0]),parseFloat(path[i-1][1])], [parseFloat(path[i][0]),parseFloat(path[i][1])]]); } } for (let i = 0; i < allOriginalSegments.length; i++) { const seg1 = allOriginalSegments[i]; for (let j = i+1; j < allOriginalSegments.length; j++) { const seg2 = allOriginalSegments[j]; const intersection = getIntersection(seg1, seg2); if (intersection && !isEndpoint(intersection, seg1) && !isEndpoint(intersection, seg2)) { if (!intersections.has(i)) intersections.set(i, []); if (!intersections.has(j)) intersections.set(j, []); intersections.get(i).push(intersection); intersections.get(j).push(intersection); } } } const removedSegments = []; for (let i = 0; i < allOriginalSegments.length; i++) { const seg = allOriginalSegments[i]; const intPoints = intersections.get(i) || []; intPoints.push(seg[0]); intPoints.push(seg[1]); intPoints.sort((a, b) => a[0] === b[0] ? a[1] - b[1] : a[0] - b[0]); for (let j = 1; j < intPoints.length; j++) { if (!pointsEqual(intPoints[j-1], intPoints[j])) { if (!(isPointInPolygons(intPoints[j-1],paths)) && !(isPointInPolygons(intPoints[j],paths))){ const newSeg = [intPoints[j-1], intPoints[j]]; const segIndex = segments.length; segments.push(newSeg); for (const pt of newSeg) { const key = pt.join(','); if (!vertices.has(key)) vertices.set(key, []); vertices.get(key).push(segIndex); } } else { removedSegments.push([intPoints[j-1], intPoints[j]]); } } } } return { segments, vertices }; } function borderOfMergedPolygons(polygons){ // caculate to collect all the line segments const { segments, vertices } = splitPathsAtIntersectionsForMergedPolygons(polygons); // build the graph const graph = buildGraph(segments, vertices); allCycles = findUniqueCycles(graph).map(cycle => cycle.map(point => point.split(',').map(Number))); allCycles = allCycles.map(cycle => [...cycle,cycle[0]]); return allCycles; } function normalizeLine(path) { if (path.length < 2) return [path]; const segments = []; const intersections = new Map(); const allOriginalSegments = []; let newPoints = []; let result = []; for (let i = 1; i < path.length; i++) { allOriginalSegments.push([[parseFloat(path[i-1][0]),parseFloat(path[i-1][1])], [parseFloat(path[i][0]),parseFloat(path[i][1])]]); } for (let i = 0; i < allOriginalSegments.length; i++) { const seg1 = allOriginalSegments[i]; for (let j = i+1; j < allOriginalSegments.length; j++) { const seg2 = allOriginalSegments[j]; const intersection = getIntersection(seg1, seg2); if (intersection && !(isEndpoint(intersection, seg1) && isEndpoint(intersection, seg2))) { if (!intersections.has(i)) intersections.set(i, []); if (!intersections.has(j)) intersections.set(j, []); intersections.get(i).push(intersection); intersections.get(j).push(intersection); } } } for (let i = 0; i < allOriginalSegments.length; i++) { const seg = allOriginalSegments[i]; const intPoints = intersections.get(i) || []; intPoints.push(seg[0]); intPoints.push(seg[1]); intPoints.sort((a, b) => { if (seg[0][0] < seg[1][0]) { return a[0] - b[0]; } else if (seg[0][0] > seg[1][0]) { return b[0] - a[0]; } else if (seg[0][1] < seg[1][1]) { return a[1] - b[1]; } else { return b[1] - a[1]; } }); for (let j = 0; j < intPoints.length-1; j++) { if (!pointsEqual(intPoints[j], intPoints[j+1])) { if (newPoints.length === 0 || !pointsEqual(intPoints[j],newPoints[newPoints.length-1])) { newPoints.push(intPoints[j]); } } } if (i === allOriginalSegments.length-1){ newPoints.push(intPoints[intPoints.length-1]); } } const tolerance = 1e-6; let currentPath = []; for (let i=0;i<newPoints.length;i++) { const curPoint = newPoints[i]; const pointExists = currentPath.some(p => JSON.stringify(p) === JSON.stringify(curPoint)); if (pointExists) { const index = currentPath.findIndex(p => Math.abs(p[0] - curPoint[0]) < tolerance && Math.abs(p[1] - curPoint[1]) < tolerance ); if (index > 0) { result.push(currentPath.slice(0,index+1)); } currentPath.push(curPoint); result.push(currentPath.slice(index)); currentPath = [curPoint]; } else { currentPath.push(curPoint); } } if (currentPath.length > 1) { result.push(currentPath); } return result; } if (shapes.length === 0) { return new List([]); } var rawlines = shapes.asArray().map(shape => shape.asArray().map(p => p.asArray())); var lines = []; let lineParts; for (const line of rawlines) { const newline = [line[0]]; for (let i=1;i<line.length-1;i++) { if (!isPointOnSegment(line[i],line[i-1],line[i+1])){ newline.push(line[i]); } } newline.push(line[line.length-1]); if (isShapeClosed(newline) && newline.length < 50) { fnl = filterDouble(newline); if (fnl.length > 1) { lines.push(newline); } } else { lineParts = normalizeLine(newline); for (const lp of lineParts) { const flp = filterDouble(lp); if (flp.length > 1) { lines.push(flp); } } } }; console.log('lines:'); console.log(lines); var innerPoint = [parseFloat(point.asArray()[0]),parseFloat(point.asArray()[1])]; var disclosedLines = lines.filter(line => !pointsEqual(line[0],line[line.length-1])); var closedLines = lines.filter(line => pointsEqual(line[0],line[line.length-1])); var li = 0; var closeRegion = findSmallestClosedRegion([lines[0]], innerPoint); while (closeRegion.length === 0 && li < lines.length -1 ) { li++; closeRegion = findSmallestClosedRegion([lines[li]], innerPoint); }; if (closeRegion.length !== 0) { var linesRest = lines.filter((_, index) => index !== li); var relatedStrokes = linesRest.filter(stroke => { let pointIn = stroke.filter(point => isPointInPolygon(point,closeRegion[0])); let intersections = findPolygonTrajectoryIntersections(closeRegion[0], stroke); const pointInUni = [ ...new Map(pointIn.map(p => [p.join(','), p])).values() ]; const intersectionsUni = [ ...new Map(intersections.map(p => [p.join(','), p])).values() ]; if (pointInUni.length > 0 || intersectionsUni.length > 1) { return true; }else{ return false; }; }); let seperatedStrokes = []; var smallestCycle = closeRegion; for (const stroke of relatedStrokes) { let intersections = findPolygonTrajectoryIntersections(smallestCycle[0], stroke); let pointIn = stroke.filter(point => isPointInPolygon(point,smallestCycle[0])); const pointInUni = [ ...new Map(pointIn.map(p => [p.join(','), p])).values() ]; const intersectionsUni = [ ...new Map(intersections.map(p => [p.join(','), p])).values() ]; const pointInCount = pointInUni.length; const intersectionsCount = intersectionsUni.length; const strokeIsClosed = pointsEqual(stroke[0],stroke[stroke.length-1]); if ( intersectionsCount > 1 && strokeIsClosed){ console.log('stroke:'); console.log(stroke); smallestCycle = smallestCycle.map(cycle => [...cycle,cycle[0]]); smallestCycle = findSmallestClosedRegion([...smallestCycle,stroke], innerPoint); } else { seperatedStrokes.push(stroke); } } if (seperatedStrokes.length > 0){ seperatedStrokes = seperatedStrokes.concat(smallestCycle.map(cycle => [...cycle,cycle[0]])); smallestCycle = findSmallestClosedRegion(seperatedStrokes, innerPoint); } } else { const bordersOfClosedLines = borderOfMergedPolygons(closedLines); var smallestCycle = findSmallestClosedRegion(disclosedLines.concat(bordersOfClosedLines), innerPoint); }; if (smallestCycle.length === 0) { return new List([]); }; let result = []; for (const cycle of smallestCycle) { for (const point of cycle) { result.push(point); } result.push(cycle[0]); result.push('!'); }; result.pop(); return new List(result.map(p => { if (p != '!') { return new List(p); }else{ return '!'; } }));

block-definition.comment: This block deletes all the variables with the names given (inside input list). Each name will make only one variable deletion, and this will be the variable found following the scope order: 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global'. If we have a "testing" sprite variable and also a "testing" global one, deleting "testing" will delete only the sprite one (Yes! we can also do "delete var (testing, testing)" to delete both. If one variable does not exists (in any scope) an error happens, stopping block action in that point. You can check it before with the "does var (name) exists?"block.
block-definition.translations: pt:remove as variáveis _ ca:esborra les variables _ es:borrar variables _ de:löschen var _

block-definition.comment: This block turns on (show) the watcher view on stage (if it was not already activated) of the variable with the given name (slot input). It can only access to the closest variable scope (if there different variables with the same name in different scopes) following the order 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global'. No errors if that variable does not exist.
block-definition.translations: ca:mostra la variable _ es:mostrar variable _ pt:mostra a variável _ de:zeige var _
zh_CN:积木倒序 _

block-definition.s: write text %'text' size %'size' by %'stepLength' gap %'gap' move %'move' style %'styleScript'
block-definition.comment: size refers to the font size, gap refers to the letter spacing. if move is set to True , the turtle moves forward after writing text and gets ready to write next text. if move is set to False, the turtle won't move after writing the last character. style could be put in a geometry block to make a stitch type.
block-definition.translations: zh_CN:绣出文字 _ 字号 _ 每针 _ 步 间距 _ 移动 _ 方式 _

custom-block.s: get svg command from svg string %txt
run svg command %txt params %l lastPoint %l and return points
drawVector %l size %n style %cmdRing mirrored %b stitch length %n

block-definition.comment: The fonts selectable via this block are licensed under the SIL-OFL license version 1.1 TS-Oswald-Light is © <Oswald-Light> TS-Oswald-Regular is © <Oswald-Regular> TS-Inter-Regular is © <Inter-Regular> TS-Serif-Regular is © <BreeSerif-Regular> TS-Courgette-Regular is © <Courgette-Regular> TS-Linea-Thin is © <Linea-Thin> TS-Lato-Black is © <Lato-Black> TS-Lato-Light is © <Lato-Light>
block-definition.translations: zh_CN:设置字体 _

inputs.input: TS-Oswald-LightTS-Oswald-Regular TS-Oswald-Light TS-Inter-Regular TS-Serif-Regular TS-Courgette-Regular TS-Linea-Thin TS-Lato-Black TS-Lato-Light

block-definition.s: cubic bezier curve points P1 %'p1' P2 %'p2' P3 %'p3' P4 %'p4' points number %'nb'

block-definition.translations: zh_CN:当前字体

block-definition.s: text length of %'str' with size %'size' gap %'gap'
block-definition.comment: this block returns the length of an embroidered text. param gap refers to the spacing between characters.
block-definition.translations: zh_CN:字符串 _ 为 _ 号字，间距为 _ 时的长度

block-definition.s: EmbroiderText %'Text' size %'Height' gap %'gap' x: %'Xpos' y: %'Ypos' align %'Alignment'
block-definition.comment: Param 1 = Text Param 2 = Text Height in 0.2 mm units Param 3 = X position in 0.2 mm units Param 4 = Y position in 0.2 mm units Param 5 = Alignment. Center (default). (X,Y) is the middle bottom Left. Take (X,Y) as left bottom Right. Take (X,Y) as right bottom The direction of the text is the current direction of the turtle.
block-definition.translations: zh_CN:绣出文本 _ 字号 _ 间距 _ x: _ y: _ 对齐 _

custom-block.s: text length of %txt with size %n gap %n
write text %txt size %n by %n gap %n move %b style %cmdRing

scripts.comment: The purpose of this block is to make it easy to place embroidered text in the design. . And to do so without specifying height and text twice, nor with the need of creating a variable for them.
